channel.description: Recent content in astro821 on Modulhandbuch Physik/Astronomie der Universität Bonn

item.title: astro821
item.description: Astrophysics of Galaxies - astro821 Course Astrophysics of Galaxies Course No. astro821 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Required Lecture with exercises English 3+1 6 ST Requirements: Preparation: Introductory astronomy as well as a good understanding of stars and their evolution as well as of the interstellar medium Form of Testing and Examination: Requirements for the examination (written or oral): successful work with exercises Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: The student shall acquire deep knowledge of the structure of the Milky Way and of other galaxies including their evolution.

item.title: astro821
item.description: Astrophysics of Galaxies - astro821 Course Astrophysics of Galaxies Course No. astro821 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Required Lecture with exercises English 3+1 6 ST Requirements for Participation: Preparation: Introductory astronomy as well as a good understanding of stars and their evolution as well as of the interstellar medium Form of Testing and Examination: Requirements for the examination (written or oral): successful work with exercises Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: The student shall acquire deep knowledge of the structure of the Milky Way and of other galaxies including their evolution.
